UNIQUE_ITEM_ID_RULE.name: UNIQUE_ITEM_ID_RULE
UNIQUE_ITEM_ID_RULE.tooltipMessage: A product with the same ID has already been added to the cart.

UNIQUE_FAMILY_RULE.name: UNIQUE_FAMILY_RULE
UNIQUE_FAMILY_RULE.tooltipMessage: A product from this family has already been added to the cart, please remove that item to add another.

MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_FAMILIES_RULE.name: MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_FAMILIES_RULE
MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_FAMILIES_RULE.tooltipMessage: A product from a mutually exclusive family has already been added to the cart, please remove that item to add another.
